RE:StoredProcedure.RE:BodyText: begin select * from NhanVien where NhanVien.UsernameNV = @user and NhanVien.PasswordNV = @pass end
RE:StoredProcedure.RE:Name: proc_dangnhap

RE:DmlTrigger.RE:BodyText: BEGIN UPDATE HoaDon SET TongTien_HD = (SELECT SUM(ThanhTienSP) FROM inserted WHERE MaHD = HoaDon.MaHD) FROM HoaDon INNER JOIN inserted ON HoaDon.MaHD = inserted.MaHD END
RE:DmlTrigger.RE:Name: CapNhatTongTienHD

RE:DmlTrigger.RE:BodyText:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
DECLARE @SoLuong INT, @MaSach INT
SELECT @SoLuong = SoLuong, @MaSach = MaSach FROM inserted
IF @SoLuong > (SELECT SoLuong FROM Sach WHERE MaSach = @MaSach) BEGIN ROLLBACK; RAISERROR ('Số lượng sách không đủ', 16, 1); END END
RE:DmlTrigger.RE:Name: KiemTraSoLuongSachTruocKhiThemHD
